thoughts.text: I received an error message that the lynx command was not found. I can use the apt-get command to install lynx.
thoughts.reasoning: The error message indicates that the lynx command is not installed on the system. I can use the apt-get command to install lynx, which should resolve the issue.
thoughts.plan: - Use the apt-get command to install lynx.
thoughts.speak: I will now use the apt-get command to install lynx.
